name: FlashCFG-Built Store Template
long_description:
Long descriptions are actually quite the doozy, they require actual HTML code to be set inside this little json variable looking thing. While quite impractical looking, it lets you entirely skip the manual process of opening your Store Page HTML ENTIRELY!

This has limitations though... Of course...

You obviously need HTML and SNDL knowledge if you wanna make this look as nice as possible.

But of course since this is just a python variable inserted into HTML code that means that yes, you can:

Create certain parts of your long description to have parts of your module/plugin info update itself when you rebuild your Store page! For example this is version [ADDON_VERSION] of FlashCFG that built this page!

And you can probably do a lot more but since I ran out of ideas, well you go figure it out yourself.
short_description: This store page was created using the Flashcord Store Quick Config Python Script!
author: SiriusBYT
